entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
